Owner
Represents a property owner, allowing the registration of properties and the calculation of average land area, automatically grouping adjacent properties.
PropertiesLoader
Singleton class responsible for loading, parsing and managing all property-related data.
Property
Represents a land property with spatial, administrative and ownership data.
SimplerProperty
A simplified representation of a Property, used for data visualization, summaries, or lightweight data processing.
SVGGenerator
 
Trade
Represents a land trade between two owners, each exchanging one property.
TradeEval
Class responsible for evaluating property trades based on area differences and converting the evaluation score into a color representation.
